properties.description: Sample notebook showing how to join a flat table with a spark table with arrays.

source:
#### Sample notebook showing how to join a flat table with a spark table with arrays

The example below shows the following:  

You have a table from Service Bus which has an array field for attachmentIds.  
You have a similar table from Horizon with attachmentIds in a flat schema - 1 row per attachmentId.  
You want to merge them together into a final table, e.g. curated layer, joining on the primary key, in this case "caseId".  

1. Create spark dataframes for each table.  
2. Explode the service bus array field "attachmentIds" so you have 1 attachmentId per row.  
3. Union the 2 dataframes as they have the same column names.  
4. Group all the attachmentIds into an array using the collect_list function, grouping by the primary key, "caseId".  
5. Use this final dataframe to load / create the final table.  

**NB: this is just an example of how this can be achieved. Each use case should be examined to see if this approach is appropriate for that particular entity**

from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType, ArrayType, StructType, StructField
from pyspark.sql import Row
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

service_bus_data = spark.sql("""
                    SELECT 
                        NSIPProjectInfoInternalID
                        ,caseId
                        ,caseReference
                        ,projectName
                        ,projectNameWelsh
                        ,projectDescription
                        ,projectDescriptionWelsh
                        ,CAST(NULL AS Timestamp) AS caseCreatedDate
                        ,decision
                        ,publishStatus
                        ,sector
                        ,projectType
                        ,sourceSystem
                        ,stage
                        ,projectLocation
                        ,projectLocationWelsh
                        ,projectEmailAddress
                        ,regions
                        ,transboundary
                        ,easting
                        ,northing
                        ,welshLanguage
                        ,mapZoomLevel
                        ,secretaryOfState
                        ,datePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject
                        ,dateProjectAppearsOnWebsite
                        ,anticipatedSubmissionDateNonSpecific
                        ,anticipatedDateOfSubmission
                        ,screeningOpinionSought
                        ,scopingOpinionIssued
                        ,section46Notification
                        ,dateOfDCOSubmission
                        ,dateOfNonAcceptance
                        ,dateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen
                        ,dateOfRelevantRepresentationClose
                        ,extensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose
                        ,dateRRepAppearOnWebsite
                        ,dateIAPIDue
                        ,rule6LetterPublishDate
                        ,preliminaryMeetingStartDate
                        ,notificationDateForPMAndEventsDirectlyFollowingPM
                        ,notificationDateForEventsDeveloper
                        ,dateSection58NoticeReceived
                        ,confirmedStartOfExamination
                        ,rule8LetterPublishDate
                        ,deadlineForCloseOfExamination
                        ,dateTimeExaminationEnds
                        ,stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate
                        ,deadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation
                        ,dateOfRecommendations
                        ,stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline
                        ,jRPeriodEndDate
                        ,dateProjectWithdrawn
                        ,operationsLeadId
                        ,operationsManagerId
                        ,caseManagerId
                        ,nsipOfficerIds
                        ,nsipAdministrationOfficerIds
                        ,leadInspectorId
                        ,inspectorIds
                        ,environmentalServicesOfficerId
                        ,legalOfficerId
                        ,applicantId
                        ,migrationStatus
                        ,dateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationStart
                        ,dateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationClose
                        ,migrated
                        ,ODTSourceSystem
                        ,SourceSystemID
                        ,IngestionDate
                        ,ValidTo
                        ,'' AS RowID
                        ,IsActive
                        --Start Horizon only fields
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS examTimetablePublishStatus
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS twitteraccountname
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS exasize
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS tene
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS promotername
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS applicantfirstname
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS applicantlastname
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS addressLine1
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS addressLine2
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS addressTown
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS addressCounty
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS Postcode
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS applicantemailaddress
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS applicantwebaddress
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS applicantphonenumber
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS applicantdescriptionofproject
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS caseNodeId
                        --End Horizon only fields
                    FROM 
                        odw_harmonised_db.sb_nsip_project

horizon_data = spark.sql("""
                SELECT
                        CAST(NULL AS Long) AS NSIPProjectInfoInternalID
                        ,HorizonCaseNumber AS caseid
                        ,casereference
                        ,projectname
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS projectNameWelsh
                        ,summary AS projectDescription
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS projectDescriptionWelsh
                        ,caseCreatedDate
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS decision
                        ,projectstatus AS publishStatus
                        ,sector
                        ,projecttype AS projectType
                        ,'Horizon' AS sourceSystem
                        ,stage
                        ,projectLocation
                        ,CAST(NULL AS Date) AS projectLocationWelsh
                        ,projectEmailAddress
                        ,Region
                        ,CAST(transboundary AS Boolean) AS transboundary
                        ,easting
                        ,northing
                        ,CAST(welshLanguage AS Boolean) AS welshLanguage
                        ,mapZoomLevel
                        ,sos AS secretaryOfState
                        ,datePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject
                        ,dateProjectAppearsOnWebsite
                        ,anticipatedSubmissionDateNonSpecific
                        ,anticipatedDateOfSubmission
                        ,screeningOpinionSought
                        ,scopingOpinionIssued
                        ,section46Notification
                        ,dateOfDCOSubmission
                        ,CAST(NULL AS Date) AS dateOfNonAcceptance
                        ,dateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen
                        ,dateOfRelevantRepresentationClose
                        ,extensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose
                        ,dateRRepAppearOnWebsite
                        ,CAST(NULL AS Date) AS dateIAPIDue
                        ,CAST(NULL AS Date) AS rule6LetterPublishDate
                        ,preliminaryMeetingStartDate
                        ,CAST(NULL AS Date) AS notificationDateForPMAndEventsDirectlyFollowingPM
                        ,CAST(NULL AS Date) AS notificationDateForEventsDeveloper
                        ,dateSection58NoticeReceived
                        ,confirmedStartOfExamination
                        ,CAST(NULL AS Date) AS rule8LetterPublishDate
                        ,deadlineForCloseOfExamination
                        ,dateTimeExaminationEnds
                        ,stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate
                        ,deadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation
                        ,dateOfRecommendations
                        ,stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline
                        ,jRPeriodEndDate
                        ,dateProjectWithdrawn
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS operationsLeadId
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS operationsManagerId
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS caseManagerId
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS nsipOfficerIds
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS nsipAdministrationOfficerIds
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS leadInspectorId
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS inspectorIds
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS environmentalServicesOfficerId
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS legalOfficerId
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS applicantId
                        ,CAST(NULL AS Boolean) AS migrationStatus
                        ,CAST(NULL AS Date) AS dateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationStart
                        ,CAST(NULL AS Date) AS dateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationClose
                        --Start Horizon only fields
                        ,examTimetablePublishStatus
                        ,twitteraccountname
                        ,exasize
                        ,tene
                        ,promotername
                        ,applicantfirstname
                        ,applicantlastname
                        ,addressLine1
                        ,addressLine2
                        ,addressTown
                        ,addressCounty
                        ,Postcode
                        ,applicantemailaddress
                        ,applicantwebaddress
                        ,applicantphonenumber
                        ,applicantdescriptionofproject
                        ,caseNodeId
                        --End Horizon only fields
                        ,'0' AS migrated
                        ,'Horizon' AS ODTSourceSystem
                        ,NULL AS SourceSystemID
                        ,ingested_datetime AS IngestionDate
                        ,expected_to AS ValidTo
                        ,'' AS RowID
                        ,'Y' AS IsActive
FROM
    odw_standardised_db.horizon_nsip_data
WHERE
    ingested_datetime = (SELECT MAX(ingested_datetime) FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_nsip_data)

#Establish aggregated view of regions
horizon_region = horizon_data.groupBy("caseid").agg(collect_list("region").alias("regions"))
horizon_data = horizon_data.join(horizon_region, on="caseid", how="inner").drop("region")

#Build nsipOfficerIds 
horizon_officer = horizon_data.groupBy("caseid").agg(collect_list("nsipOfficerIds").alias("nsipOfficerIds"))

horizon_data = horizon_data.drop("nsipOfficerIds")
horizon_data = horizon_data.join(horizon_officer, on="caseid", how="inner")

#Build nsipAdministrationOfficerIds 
horizon_Administrationofficer = horizon_data.groupBy("caseid").agg(collect_list("nsipAdministrationOfficerIds").alias("nsipAdministrationOfficerIds"))

horizon_data = horizon_data.drop("nsipAdministrationOfficerIds")
horizon_data = horizon_data.join(horizon_Administrationofficer, on="caseid", how="inner")
#Build inspectorIds
horizon_inspectorIds = horizon_data.groupBy("caseid").agg(collect_list("inspectorIds").alias("inspectorIds"))

horizon_data = horizon_data.drop("inspectorIds")
horizon_data = horizon_data.join(horizon_inspectorIds, on="caseid", how="inner")

#sort columns into same order as service bus
horizon_data = horizon_data.select(service_bus_data.columns)
Now need to sort internal ids, IsActive flags, and valid_to dates

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_nsip_project_calculations_base
AS
SELECT  
    row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY caseid ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC) AS ReverseOrderProcessed
    ,row_number() OVER(ORDER BY IngestionDate ASC, caseid ASC) AS NSIPProjectInfoInternalID
    ,caseid
    ,IngestionDate
    ,ValidTo
    ,'0' AS migrated
    ,CASE row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY caseid ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC)
        WHEN 1 THEN
            'Y'
        ELSE
            'N'
    END AS IsActive                
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.nsip_project

df_calcs = spark.sql("""
                        SELECT
                            CurrentRow.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID
                            ,CurrentRow.caseid 
                            ,CurrentRow.IngestionDate
                            ,COALESCE(CurrentRow.ValidTo, NextRow.IngestionDate) AS ValidTo
                            ,CASE
                                WHEN raw.caseid IS NOT NULL THEN 
                                    "1"
                                ELSE 
                                    "0"
                            END AS migrated
                            ,CurrentRow.IsActive
                        FROM
                            vw_nsip_project_calculations_base AS CurrentRow
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_nsip_project_calculations_base AS NextRow
                                ON CurrentRow.caseid = NextRow.caseid
                                AND CurrentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed - 1 = NextRow.ReverseOrderProcessed
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT caseid FROM odw_harmonised_db.sb_nsip_project) AS Raw
                                ON CurrentRow.caseid = Raw.caseid """)

df_calcs =df_calcs.withColumnRenamed("caseid", "temp_caseid").withColumnRenamed("IngestionDate", "temp_IngestionDate")


#To Do: Need to complete this statement. At the moment will return duplicate fields called RowID
results = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT 
        * 
        ,MD5(
            COALESCE(
                    IFNULL(caseId, '.')
                    ,IFNULL(caseReference, '.')
                    ,IFNULL(projectName, '.')
                    ,IFNULL(projectNameWelsh, '.')
                    ,IFNULL(projectDescription, '.')
                    ,IFNULL(projectDescriptionWelsh, '.')
                    ,IFNULL(caseCreatedDate, '.')
                    ,IFNULL(decision, '.')
                    ,IFNULL(publishStatus, '.')
                    ,IFNULL(sector, '.')
                    ,IFNULL(projectType, '.')
                    ,IFNULL(sourceSystem, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(stage, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(projectLocation, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(projectLocationWelsh, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(projectEmailAddress, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(regions, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(transboundary, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(easting, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(northing, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(welshLanguage, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(mapZoomLevel, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(secretaryOfState, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(datePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(dateProjectAppearsOnWebsite, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(anticipatedSubmissionDateNonSpecific, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(anticipatedDateOfSubmission, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(screeningOpinionSought, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(scopingOpinionIssued, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(section46Notification, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(dateOfDCOSubmission, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(dateOfNonAcceptance, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(dateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(dateOfRelevantRepresentationClose, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(extensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(dateRRepAppearOnWebsite, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(dateIAPIDue, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(rule6LetterPublishDate, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(preliminaryMeetingStartDate, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(notificationDateForPMAndEventsDirectlyFollowingPM, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(notificationDateForEventsDeveloper, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(dateSection58NoticeReceived, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(confirmedStartOfExamination, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(rule8LetterPublishDate, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(deadlineForCloseOfExamination, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(dateTimeExaminationEnds, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(deadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(dateOfRecommendations, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(jRPeriodEndDate, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(dateProjectWithdrawn, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(operationsLeadId, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(operationsManagerId, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(caseManagerId, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(nsipOfficerIds, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(nsipAdministrationOfficerIds, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(leadInspectorId, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(inspectorIds, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(environmentalServicesOfficerId, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(legalOfficerId, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(applicantId, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(migrationStatus, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(dateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationStart, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(dateOfReOpenRelevantRepresentationClose, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(migrated, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(ODTSourceSystem, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(SourceSystemID, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(IngestionDate, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(ValidTo, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(IsActive, '.')
                        --Start Horizon only fields
                        ,IFNULL(examTimetablePublishStatus, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(twitteraccountname, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(exasize, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(tene, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(promotername, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(applicantfirstname, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(applicantlastname, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(addressLine1, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(addressLine2, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(addressTown, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(addressCounty, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(Postcode, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(applicantemailaddress, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(applicantwebaddress, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(applicantphonenumber, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(applicantdescriptionofproject, '.')
                        ,IFNULL(caseNodeId, '.')
            )
        ) AS RowID
    FROM 
        {spark_table_final}")


results = results.drop("NSIPProjectInfoInternalID", "ValidTo", "migrated", "IsActive")

final_df = results.join(df_calcs, (df_calcs["temp_caseid"] == results["caseid"]) & (df_calcs["temp_IngestionDate"] == results["IngestionDate"])).select(service_bus_data.columns)

display(final_df)
